Linear SDP problem

\[\begin{align*} &\min c^Tx \\ &\text{s.t.}\\ &\quad\sum_{i=1}^n x_i A_i - B \succeq 0 \end{align*}\]

where $x \in \mathbb{R}^n$ and $A_i,B \in \mathbb{S}^m$.
